boardgame.name: Path of Light and Shadow
boardgame.description: The Realms lay divided, their former wonder lost and forgotten. The Tyrant Queen has seized the throne, forcing the rightful heirs deep into exile. You are the sons and daughters of the once-great houses: Foxway, Gorga, Mherzeen, and Spyre. Under the tutelage of advisors, you have gathered your followers, your conscripts. The time has come to take back what is yours._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Path of Light and Shadow is a massive empire-building experience, combining area control, deck management, and civilization customization. As players vie for control of The Realms, they must enlist and promote supporters, outfit their burgeoning empire with powerful technologies, align with powerful leaders, and lay siege to rival exiles after the throne. Above all else, each player must decide what type of leader they will become, cruel or merciful. But choose wisely, for each path has its rewards and perils._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: #17: Battlelore 2nd Edition and Board Game Life Hacks
Episode 18 - Path of Play (Featuring The Mind, Kingsburg, Majesty for the Realm, Clank! In Space! and more!)
Episode 20 - We Play All The GAMES! (Featuring Manhattan, Decrypto, Path of Light and Shadow, Castell, and much more)
Episode 51 :: Mansions of Madness Review + Interview with Tony Gullotti of Arcane Wonders
Episode 85 :: Blue Peg Pink Peg Interview

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

This is the Kickstarter edition. Played once - complete and in excellent condition. Buyer to pay actual USPS shipping costs. The box size is taller than the traditional square box, very close to the Imperial Assault/SW: Rebellion size boxes. So it won_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t fit in a medium flat rate box. It will fit in a large flat rate box which ships in the US for $18.85. If you are in Southern California it may be possible to send it cheaper.
